5.name: Bleaching
5.desc: Removing colour by treatment with an oxidizing agent (a bleach).

8.name: Processing of structured information
8.desc: The information to be processed is in structured form.

9.name:
Processing of identical information in structured and unstructured
                                    form
9.desc:
The information to be processed is identical and given in structured
                                    and unstructured form.

10.name:
Processing of different information in structured and unstructured
                                    form
10.desc:
The information to be processed is different and is given in
                                    structured and unstructured form.

11.name: Processing of unstructured information
11.desc: The information to be processed is in unstructured form.

19.name: Acceptance of business conditions
19.desc:
Code specifying the process of accepting the terms and conditions
                                    under which business will be conducted.

20.name: Pathology service
20.desc: The provision of a pathology service.

21.name: Radiology service
21.desc: The provision of a radiology service.

23.name: Clinical donation
23.desc: The process of providing a clinical donation.

24.name: Medical general practice
24.desc: The provision of general medical services.

25.name: Specialist medical service
25.desc:
The provision of specialist medical services, other than pathology or
                                    radiology.

26.name: Dispensing of medicine
26.desc:
The process performed by a pharmacist to prepare and dispense medicine
                                    according to a prescription.
